about_the_game:
The festive season takes a dark turn in Satan Santa, a first-person horror walking simulator where Christmas cheer turns into sheer terror. Alone in your family’s isolated home, you soon realize Santa isn’t the jolly figure you thought he was—he’s a vengeful, bloodthirsty monster.

Explore and Survive:
Follow the bloodstained trail through your home and into the snow-covered wilderness, uncovering chilling notes and clues about your family’s fate. All paths lead to a mysterious church, where the ultimate confrontation with Satan Santa awaits.

Face the Horror:
With no inventory system and limited resources, you must rely on your flashlight and weapon found in the environment to survive. Will you evade Santa’s wrath—or fight back in a desperate struggle?

Features:

  • Intense Atmosphere: Blood-splattered environments, sinister soundscapes, and Santa’s chilling laughter immerse you in a terrifying holiday experience.

  • First-Person Action: Battle Santa and his horrifying reindeer in tense, action-packed moments.

  • A Haunting Story: Discover disturbing notes that reveal Santa’s hatred for Christmas and his transformation into a monstrous figure.

  • Immersive Gameplay: Dialogue and key events pull you deeper into the nightmare, culminating in an epic final showdown.

This 20-minute horror experience is perfect for fans of dark, twisted tales and seasonal scares. Will you survive the night, or fall victim to Satan Santa’s wrath?

content_descriptors.notes: Contains scenes of violence, disturbing imagery, blood, gore, and scares.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 3.0 (Linux-based)
  • Processor: AMD APU (Zen 2 architecture, 4 cores, 8 threads, 2.4-3.5 GHz)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RDNA 2 (8 compute units, 1.0-1.6 GHz)
  • Storage: 666 MB available space

short_description: Satan Santa is a first-person horror walking simulator where you play as a child trapped in a Christmas nightmare. The jolly Santa you once knew has become a bloodthirsty demon, and now you must fight for survival through an eerie house and a forest filled with horrors.
